## Case in point - MÃºlaberg

```{r}
omar::mmsi_vessel(con) %>% 
  filter(vid == 1281) %>% 
  pull(mmsi) ->
  MMSI
# slow, not indexed
astd <- 
  omar:::pam_trail(con) %>% 
  filter(mmsi == MMSI) %>% 
  collect(n = Inf)
mar:::stk_mid_vid(con) %>% 
  filter(vid == 1281) %>% 
  pull(mid) ->
  MID
ais <- 
  stk_trail(con) %>% 
  filter(mid == MID) %>% 
  collect(n = Inf)
d <- 
  bind_rows(ais %>% select(time, lon, lat, speed) %>% mutate(source = "stk"),
            astd %>% select(time, lon, lat) %>% mutate(source = "ast")) %>% 
  arrange(time) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lon", "lat"),
           crs = 4326,
           remove = FALSE)
d %>% 
  mutate(year = lubridate::year(time)) %>% 
  filter(year == 2020) %>% 
  filter(between(lon, -30, -10),
         between(lat, 62, 69)) %>% 
  mapdeck() %>% 
  add_scatterplot(fill_colour = "source",
                  radius = 100,
                  legend = TRUE)
```
